name: Samsung HW-Q800T - 3.1.2 Channel Sound bar system for home theater with Wireless Subwoofer - Black | Dell USA
description: Soundbar Q800T syncs with your Samsung TV creating immersive sound. It combines and enhances sound through the soundbar's speakers as well as the TV's speakers, giving you an advanced level of acoustic immersion so you can experience content like never before. Hear each distinct sound as it flows around and above you, just as you would in real life.
